task.summary: Added Counts. Worked on detector module, there were some issues with the interface with the Perkin Elmer detector. Most were concentrated in the method for storing files. Additional work may need to be done on the PE based corrections, there was little consensus on how frequently to update the corrections, and there is no current way to obtain a bad pixel file. Work on the areaDetector module is put on hold, pending more information or a physical detector.
Added gas valve support and commands
Multiple Valve support and switched over to __initPV startup script
Worked on flow controlers, need to do work on TODOs
Minor refactor, major refactor coming soon with more documentation
Added numpy docstrings, examples, and removed the multi_move wait statement
Documented most of the instrument api except for the detector
Documented most of the instrument api except for the detector

Additional work may need to be done on the PE based corrections, there was little consensus on how frequently to update the corrections, and there is no current way to obtain a bad pixel file. Work on the areaDetector module is put on hold, pending more information or a physical detector.
